nodes.bodyText: Hrm interesting, yes, but then it doesn't seem to matter if the build is layered or not
I wonder why  assertThat(jarFile.getEntry("BOOT-INF/layers.idx")).isNull(); doesn't fail when we have it.
@loosebazooka are you running the ./gradlew integT task? They don't run in non-integration tests.
pretty sure I am, is it failing for you?
oh that directory isn't used. It was some artifact of the copy. Sorry.
This can be chained? new Command(cmd).setWorkingDir(...).run()
we can remove this since it's for a non-layered spring-boot jar
oh oops, forgot to hit refresh.
